sentence: In early trading on Wednesday, shares of Boeing ( BA ) topped the list of the day's best performing Dow Jones Industrial Average components, trading up 0.9%.
Year to date, Boeing registers a 33.6% gain.
And the worst performing Dow component thus far on the day is Home Depot ( HD ), trading down 1.6%.
Home Depot is showing a gain of 7.8% looking at the year to date performance.
Two other components making moves today are UnitedHealth Group ( UNH ), trading down 1.3%, and Merck ( MRK ), trading up 0.6% on the day.
The views and opinions expressed herein are the views and opinions of the author and do not necessarily reflect those of Nasdaq, Inc.
